overview:
Frederieke Winkler Prins is CEO at the ITRP Institute.

Frederieke has well over 15 years of experience in the IT service management (ITSM) industry and has been an ITIL master since 1993. She worked in a variety of consultant and management capacities for organizations like HP and BMC Software.

Throughout her career she remained focused on delivering quantifiable results from ITSM implementations while at the same time dramatically simplifying ITSM processes and their supporting applications.

Frederieke has always been on the leading edge of ITSM together with her brother Cor, the VP Product Management. The first recognition of their work came with the acquisition of their employer PROLIN in 1997 by HP. They subsequently co-founded Service Management Partners, which was acquired by BMC Software in 2007.
